game.title: The Sacred Tome
game.objective: Retrieve the Lost Enchanted Book from Wildfort Castle
game.description: Locate and return the ancient enchanted book that was lost in the ruins of Wildfort Castle. Uncover what secrets lie within and defeat any foes that stand in your path.

task.description: Navigate the treacherous terrain and reach the entrance of the castle.
Overcome the powerful castle guards using your skills or magic.
Search the castle library for the ancient tome. It is said to glow with an ethereal light.
